input.sentences: friday was open mic night at the local cafe .
someone spun some tunes while we danced .
then the main attraction | a local ska artist sang .
he was a huge hit | and we told him so after the show .
output.sentences: We went to the local bar for open mic night.
When we got there a guy was singing and playing the guitar.
Soon afterwards a DJ went to the mic and began spinning disc; we got up and began to dance.
Next one of our friends went up and began to sing.
All in all the night was a huge success.
